intro.text: You, {playerName}, have just moved to a new town. It's quiet and seems like the perfect place to start fresh. One day, while at a local caf√©, you meet {loverName}. They seem charming and friendly.

firstEncounter_friendly.text: {loverName} smiles warmly at you. 'It's nice to meet someone new in town,' they say. Over the next few days, you notice {loverName} showing up wherever you go. You also start making friends, including {friendName}, who becomes quite close to you.

firstEncounter_distant.text: {loverName} seems taken aback by your distance but doesn't push further. Over the next few days, you notice {loverName} showing up wherever you go. You also start making friends, including {friendName}, who becomes quite close to you.

ending_step_name.text: You move to a new city and start fresh. The memory of {loverName} fades over time, and you find peace.
You stay with {familyMemberName} for a while. Their support helps you recover from the ordeal, and you eventually find happiness again.
